description.english: Survive to the end of a round of Zombie
description.german: Überlebe eine Zombieangriffsrunde.
description.french: Survivez à une vague de zombies.
description.italian: Sopravvivi alla fine di un round di zombie
description.spanish: Sobrevive una ronda de Zombi hasta el final.
description.brazilian: Sobreviva até o final de uma rodada de Zumbis
description.russian: Выживите до конца матча Зомби
description.polish: Przetrwaj do konca rundy zombie
description.turkish: Bir Zombi turunun sonuna kadar hayatta kal

description.english: Take out 3 survivors in 1 round
description.german: Vernichte 3 Überlebende in 1 Runde.
description.french: Éliminez 3 survivants en une manche.
description.italian: Uccidi 3 sopravvissuti in 1 round
description.spanish: Acaba con 3 supervivientes en una ronda.
description.brazilian: Mate 3 sobreviventes em 1 rodada
description.russian: Убейте 3 выживших за один матч
description.polish: Zlikwiduj 3 ocalalych w 1 rundzie
description.turkish: 1 turda 3 hayatta kalani öldür

description.english: Start the round as a zombie, and wipe out the highest number of enemy players
description.german: Beginne die Runde als Zombie und lösche die höchstmögliche Anzahl an gegnerischen Spielern aus.
description.french: Démarrez une manche en tant que zombie et terminez la manche en ayant éliminé le plus grand nombre de joueurs ennemis.
description.italian: Inizia il round come zombie ed elimina il maggior numero possibile di giocatori nemici
description.spanish: Empieza la ronda como zombi y acaba con la mayor cantidad de enemigos posible.
description.brazilian: Comece a rodada como zumbi e acabe com o número mais alto de jogadores inimigos
description.russian: Начните матч в роли зомби и убейте наибольшее количество вражеских игроков
description.polish: Rozpocznij runde jako zombie i zlikwiduj najwyzsza liczbe wrogich graczy
description.turkish: Tura bir zombi olarak basla ve öldürebildigin kadar düsman öldür

description.english: Playing as a zombie, make an enemy player fall to their death
description.german: Spiele als Zombie und sorge dafür, dass ein gegnerischer Spieler zu Tode stürzt.
description.french: En incarnant un zombie, tuez un joueur ennemi en le faisant tomber.
description.italian: Giocando nel ruolo di uno zombie, uccidi un giocatore nemico
description.spanish: Juega como zombi y consigue que un enemigo muera.
description.brazilian: Jogando como zumbi, faça um jogador inimigo cair e morrer
description.russian: Играя за зомби, заставьте игрока противника разбиться насмерть, упав с большой высоты
description.polish: Grajac jako zombie, spraw, by wrogi gracz zabil sie w wyniku upadku
description.turkish: Bir zombi olarak oyna ve bir düsmanin düserek ölmesini sagla

description.english: Start the round as VIP and kill the highest number of enemy players
description.german: Beginne die Runde als VIP und vernichte die höchstmögliche Anzahl an gegnerischen Spielern.
description.french: Démarrez une manche en tant que VIP et terminez la manche en ayant éliminé le plus grand nombre de joueurs ennemis.
description.italian: Inizia il round come VIP e uccidi il maggior numero possibile di giocatori nemici
description.spanish: Empieza la ronda como VIP y mata a la mayor cantidad de enemigos posible.
description.brazilian: Comece a rodada como VIP e mate o número mais alto de jogadores inimigos
description.russian: Начните матч в роли VIP-персоны и убейте наибольшее количество вражеских игроков
description.polish: Rozpocznij runde jako VIP i zlikwiduj najwyzsza liczbe wrogich graczy
description.turkish: Tura bir VIP olarak basla ve öldürebildigin kadar düsman öldür

description.english: Start the round as VIP, kill no enemy players, and survive anyway
description.german: Beginne die Runde als VIP, vernichte keine gegnerischen Spieler, aber überlebe.
description.french: Démarrez une manche en tant que VIP et survivez sans tuer un seul joueur ennemi.
description.italian: Inizia il round come VIP, non uccidere giocatori nemici ma sopravvivi lo stesso
description.spanish: Empieza la ronda como VIP y sobrevive sin matar enemigos.
description.brazilian: Comece a rodada como VIP, não mate nenhum jogador inimigo e consiga sobreviver
description.russian: Начните матч в роли VIP-персоны, не убейте ни одного вражеского игрока и выживите до самого конца
description.polish: Rozpocznij runde jako VIP, nie zabij zadnych wrogich graczy i zdolaj przezyc
description.turkish: Tura bir VIP olarak basla, hiç düsman öldürme ama hayatta kal

description.english: Pick up a diamond within 5 seconds of it spawning, and make it to a dropoff point without dropping it
description.german: Sammle einen Diamanten innerhalb von 5 Sekunden nach dessen Spawnvorgang auf und liefere ihn an einer Abgabestelle ab, ohne ihn fallen zu lassen.
description.french: Ramassez un diamant dans les 5 secondes qui suivent son apparition et ramenez-le à un point de dépôt sans le lâcher.
description.italian: Raccogli un diamante entro 5 secondi dalla sua generazione e raggiungi un punto di raccolta senza perderlo
description.spanish: Recoge un diamante antes de que pasen 5 segundos desde su aparición y consigue llegar a un punto de entrega sin que se te caiga.
description.brazilian: Pegue um diamante até 5 segundos depois que ele aparecer e leve-o ao ponto de entrega sem deixá-lo cair
description.russian: Подберите бриллиант в течении 5 секунд после его появления и донесите его до места доставки ни разу не обронив
description.polish: Podnies diament w przeciagu 5 sekund od jego pojawienia i dostarcz go do punktu zrzutu, nie upuszczajac go
description.turkish: Bir elmas çikar çikmaz 5 saniye içinde elmasi al ve düsürmeden teslimat noktasina götür

description.english: Find and drop off 3 diamonds in one match
description.german: Finde in einem Spiel 3 Diamanten und liefere sie ab.
description.french: Trouvez 3 diamants dans une partie et ramenez-les au point de dépôt.
description.italian: Trova e deposita 3 diamanti in una partita
description.spanish: Encuentra y entrega 3 diamantes en una partida.
description.brazilian: Encontre e entregue 3 diamantes em uma partida
description.russian: Найдите и доставьте 3 бриллианта за один матч
description.polish: Znajdz i zrzuc 3 diamenty w jednej grze
description.turkish: Bir müsabakada 3 elmas bul ve teslim et

description.english: Steal and drop off 5 diamonds found by the enemy team before they pick them up
description.german: Stehle 5 vom feindlichen Team gefundene Diamanten, bevor dieses die Diamanten aufsammelt, und liefere sie ab.
description.french: Volez 5 diamants trouvés par l'équipe ennemie puis ramenez-les au point de dépôt avant qu'elle ne les récupère.
description.italian: Ruba e deposita 5 diamanti trovati dalla squadra dei nemici prima che li raccolgano
description.spanish: Roba y entrega 5 diamantes que haya encontrado el equipo enemigo antes de que este los recoja.
description.brazilian: Roube e entregue 5 diamantes encontrados pela equipe inimiga antes que eles os coletem
description.russian: Украдите и доставьте по назначению 5 бриллиантов, найденных противниками, до того как те успеют их подобрать
description.polish: Ukradnij i zrzuc 5 diamentów odnalezionych przez czlonków druzyny wroga, zanim zdaza je podniesc
description.turkish: Düsman takim tarafindan bulunan 5 elmasi çal ve onlar geri almadan teslim et

description.english: Intercept 10 diamonds carried by the enemy team and make it to a dropoff point
description.german: Fange 10 Diamanten ab, die das feindliche Team bei sich trägt, und liefere sie an einer Abgabestelle ab.
description.french: Interceptez 10 diamants transportés par l'équipe ennemie et ramenez-les à un point de dépôt.
description.italian: Intercetta 10 diamanti trasportati dalla squadra nemica e portali a un punto di raccolta
description.spanish: Intercepta 10 diamantes transportados por el equipo enemigo y consigue llegar con ellos a un punto de entrega.
description.brazilian: Intercepte 10 diamantes carregados pela equipe inimiga e leve-os a um ponto de entrega
description.russian: Перехватите 10 бриллиантов у противников и доставьте их до пункта назначения
description.polish: Przejmij 10 diamentów niesionych przez druzyne wroga i dostarcz je do punktu zrzutu
description.turkish: Düsman takim tarafindan tasinan 10 elmasi durdur ve teslimat noktasina götür

description.english: Be the only player to score points from a hill before it vanishes
description.german: Erziele als einziger Spieler Hügel-Punkte, bevor der Hügel verschwindet.
description.french: Soyez le seul joueur à marquer des points sur une colline avant qu'elle ne disparaisse.
description.italian: Prova ad essere l'unico giocatore a guadagnare punti da una collina prima che sparisca
description.spanish: Sé el único jugador que consiga puntos en una colina antes de que desaparezca.
description.brazilian: Seja o único jogador a conseguir pontos de uma colina antes que ela desapareça
description.russian: Будьте единственным игроком, получившим очки за холм, прежде чем тот исчезнет
description.polish: Zdobadz jako jedyny gracz punkty ze wzgórza, zanim zniknie
description.turkish: Bir tepe yok olmadan önce o tepeden puan kazanan tek oyuncu ol

description.english: Trigger 5 airstrikes and survive
description.german: Löse 5 Luftangriffe aus und überlebe sie.
description.french: Déclenchez 5 frappes aériennes et survivez.
description.italian: Attiva 5 bombardamenti aerei e sopravvivi
description.spanish: Lanza 5 ataques aéreos y sobrevive.
description.brazilian: Dispare 5 ataques aéreos e sobreviva
description.russian: Инициируйте 5 воздушных атак и выживите
description.polish: Aktywuj 5 nalotów i przezyj
description.turkish: 5 hava saldirisi tetikle ve hayatta kal

description.english: Trigger an airstrike and survive without leaving the hill
description.german: Löse einen Luftangriff aus und überlebe, ohne den Hügel zu verlassen.
description.french: Déclenchez une frappe aérienne et survivez sans quitter la colline.
description.italian: Attiva un bombardamento aereo e sopravvivi senza lasciare la collina
description.spanish: Lanza un ataque aéreo y sobrevive sin abandonar la colina.
description.brazilian: Dispare um ataque aéreo e sobreviva sem deixar a colina
description.russian: Инициируйте воздушную атаку и выживите, не покидая холм
description.polish: Aktywuj nalot i przezyj, nie opuszczajac wzgórza
description.turkish: Bir hava saldirisi tetikle ve tepeyi terk etmeden hayatta kal

description.english: Take control of 10 contested hills
description.german: Übernimm die Kontrolle über 10 umkämpfte Hügel.
description.french: Prenez le contrôle de 10 collines disputées.
description.italian: Assumi il controllo di 10 colline contese
description.spanish: Hazte con el control de 10 colinas disputadas.
description.brazilian: Assuma o controle de 10 colinas disputadas
description.russian: Завладейте 10 оспариваемыми холмами
description.polish: Przejmij kontrole nad 10 spornymi wzgórzami
description.turkish: 10 çekismeli tepenin kontrolünü ele geçir

description.english: Retain control of 10 contested hills
description.german: Behalte die Kontrolle über 10 umkämpfte Hügel.
description.french: Regagnez le contrôle de 10 collines disputées.
description.italian: Mantieni il controllo di 10 colline contese
description.spanish: Mantén el control de 10 colinas disputadas.
description.brazilian: Mantenha o controle de 10 colinas disputadas
description.russian: Удержите контроль над 10 оспариваемыми холмами
description.polish: Zachowaj kontrole nad 10 spornymi wzgórzami
description.turkish: 10 çekismeli tepenin kontrolünü elinde tut

description.english: Take out 50 enemy players while you are in an active hill
description.german: Vernichte 50 gegnerische Spieler, während du in einem aktiven Hügel bist.
description.french: Tuez 50 joueurs ennemis pendant que vous êtes sur une colline active.
description.italian: Elimina 50 giocatori nemici mentre sei su una collina attiva
description.spanish: Acaba con 50 enemigos desde una colina activa.
description.brazilian: Acabe com 50 jogadores inimigos enquanto você está em uma colina ativa
description.russian: Убейте 50 врагов, находясь в действующем холме
description.polish: Zlikwiduj 50 wrogich graczy, gdy znajdujesz sie w aktywnym wzgórzu
description.turkish: Sen aktif bir tepedeyken 50 düsman oyuncuyu öldür

description.english: Take out 50 enemy players while they are in an active hill
description.german: Vernichte 50 gegnerische Spieler, während sie in einem aktiven Hügel sind.
description.french: Tuez 50 joueurs ennemis pendant qu'ils sont sur une colline active.
description.italian: Elimina 50 giocatori nemici mentre sono su una collina attiva
description.spanish: Acaba con 50 enemigos que estén en una colina activa.
description.brazilian: Acabe com 50 jogadores inimigos enquanto eles estão em uma colina ativa
description.russian: Убейте 50 врагов, находящихся в действующем холме
description.polish: Zlikwiduj 50 wrogich graczy, gdy znajduja sie w aktywnym wzgórzu
description.turkish: Düsmanlarin aktif bir tepedeyken 50 düsman oyuncuyu öldür

description.english: Drop a bomb in the enemy base and survive
description.german: Lege im gegnerischen Stützpunkt eine Bombe und überlebe.
description.french: Posez une bombe sur la base ennemie et survivez.
description.italian: Sgancia una bomba sulla base nemica e sopravvivi
description.spanish: Tira una bomba en la base enemiga y sobrevive.
description.brazilian: Coloque uma bomba na base inimiga e sobreviva
description.russian: Сбросьте бомбу на базу противника и выживите
description.polish: Zrzuc bombe na baze wroga i przezyj
description.turkish: Düsman üssüne bir bomba birak ve hayatta kal

description.english: Pick up a bomb from a spawn point and make it to the enemy base without dropping it
description.german: Sammle an einem Spawnpunkt eine Bombe auf und erreiche den gegnerischen Stützpunkt, ohne sie fallen zu lassen.
description.french: Ramassez une bombe sur un point d'apparition et apportez-la à la base ennemie sans la faire tomber.
description.italian: Raccogli una bomba da un punto di generazione e arriva alla base nemica senza farla cadere
description.spanish: Recoge una bomba de un punto de aparición y consigue llegar hasta la base enemiga sin que se te caiga.
description.brazilian: Pegue uma bomba de um ponto de aparecimento e leve-a até a base inimiga sem deixá-la cair
description.russian: Подберите появившуюся бомбу и донесите ее до базы противника, ни разу не обронив
description.polish: Podnies bombe w miejscu pojawienia i dostarcz ja do bazy wroga, nie upuszczajac jej
description.turkish: Bir dogma noktasindan bir bomba al ve düsürmeden düsman üssüne ulas

description.english: Intercept 5 bomb carriers and defend the bomb until it detonates early.
description.german: Fange 5 Bombenträger ab und verteidige die Bombe, bis sie vorzeitig explodiert.
description.french: Interceptez 5 porteurs de bombe et défendez la bombe jusqu'à sa détonation anticipée.
description.italian: Intercetta 5 trasportatori di bombe e difendi la bomba fino a quando non detona anticipatamente.
description.spanish: Intercepta a 5 enemigos que transporten bombas y defiende la bomba hasta que se detone antes de tiempo.
description.brazilian: Intercepte 5 carregadores de bombas e defenda a bomba até que ela detone.
description.russian: Перехватите 5 носителей бомб и защитите бомбу до тех пор, пока она не взорвется раньше времени
description.polish: Przejmij 5 nosicieli bomb i ochraniaj bombe, dopóki nie wybuchnie przedwczesnie.
description.turkish: Bomba tasiyan 5 kisiyi durdur ve erkenden patlayana kadar bombayi koru.

description.english: Be the final player to plant a bomb successfully, and then win the round.
description.german: Lege als letzter Spieler erfolgreich eine Bombe und gewinne die Runde.
description.french: Soyez le dernier jouer à poser une bombe avec succès, puis remportez la manche.
description.italian: Prova a essere l'ultimo giocatore a collocare una bomba con successo e poi vinci il round.
description.spanish: Sé el último jugador en colocar con éxito una bomba y gana la ronda.
description.brazilian: Seja o último jogador a colocar uma bomba com sucesso e, a seguir, vença a rodada.
description.russian: Будьте последним игроком, удачно подложившим бомбу, прежде чем матч был выигран.
description.polish: Podlóz bombe z powodzeniem jako ostatni gracz, a pózniej wygraj runde.
description.turkish: Bir bombayi basarili bir sekilde yerlestiren son oyuncu ol ve turu kazan.

description.english: Repair 100 blocks of damage to your base
description.german: Repariere 100 Würfel Schäden an deinem Stützpunkt.
description.french: Réparez 100 blocs endommagés sur votre base.
description.italian: Ripara 100 blocchi di danno alla tua base
description.spanish: Repara 100 bloques dañados en tu base.
description.brazilian: Repare 100 blocos de dano à sua base
description.russian: Почините 100 поврежденных блоков на вашей базе
description.polish: Napraw 100 bloków obrazen twojej bazy
description.turkish: Üssünde 100 blokluk hasari onar

description.english: Cause 100 blocks of damage to the enemy base in one round
description.german: Verursache in einer Runde 100 Würfel Schäden am feindlichen Stützpunkt.
description.french: Endommagez 100 blocs de la base ennemie en une seule manche.
description.italian: Causa 100 blocchi di danno alla base del nemico in un round
description.spanish: Daña 100 bloques de la base enemiga en una ronda.
description.brazilian: Cause 100 blocos de dano à base inimiga em uma rodada
description.russian: Повредите 100 блоков на базе противника за один матч
description.polish: Zadaj wrogiej bazie 100 bloków obrazen w jednej rundzie
description.turkish: Tek turda düsman üssünde 100 blokluk hasara yol aç

description.english: Cause 500 blocks of damage to the enemy base over multiple rounds
description.german: Verursache über mehrere Runden 500 Würfel Schäden am feindlichen Stützpunkt.
description.french: Endommagez 500 blocs de la base ennemie en plusieurs manches.
description.italian: Causa 500 blocchi di danno alla base del nemico in più round
description.spanish: Daña 500 bloques de la base enemiga en varias rondas.
description.brazilian: Cause 500 blocos de dano à base inimiga em várias rodadas
description.russian: Повредите 500 блоков на базе противника за несколько матчей
description.polish: Zadaj wrogiej bazie 500 bloków obrazen w wielu rundach
description.turkish: Birden fazla turda düsman üssünde 500 blokluk hasara yol aç

description.english: Be the final player to cause damage to the enemy base and win
description.german: Verursache als letzter Spieler Schaden am feindlichen Stützpunkt und gewinne die Runde.
description.french: Soyez le dernier joueur à endommager la base ennemie avant de remporter la partie.
description.italian: Prova a essere l'ultimo giocatore a causare danni alla base del nemico e vinci
description.spanish: Sé el último jugador en causar daños en la base del enemigo y álzate con la victoria.
description.brazilian: Seja o último jogador a causar dano ao inimigo e vencer
description.russian: Будьте последним игроком, нанесшим повреждение базе противника, прежде чем матч был выигран.
description.polish: Zadaj wrogiej bazie obrazenia jako ostatni gracz i zwyciez
description.turkish: Düsman üssüne hasar verip kazanan son oyuncu ol

description.english: Demolish a structure of 50 blocks or more using the minigun
description.german: Zerstöre mit der Minigun einen Bau aus 50 oder mehr Würfeln.
description.french: Démolissez une structure d'au moins 50 blocs à l'aide du mini-canon.
description.italian: Demolisci una struttura di almeno 50 blocchi usando il minigun
description.spanish: Derriba una estructura de al menos 50 bloques con tu cañón de repetición.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma estrutura de 50 blocos ou mais usando a miniarma
description.russian: Разрушьте постройку размером 50 блоков или больше с помощью скорострельной мини-пушки
description.polish: Zburz budowle majaca 50 lub wiecej bloków za pomoca miniguna
description.turkish: Mitralyözle bir yapiya 50 veya daha fazla blokluk bir hasar vererek yapiyi yik

description.english: Make someone fall to their death using rocket launcher knockback
description.german: Verwende den Raketenwerfer, um jemanden in den Tod stürzen zu lassen.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi en le faisant tomber après une explosion au lance-roquettes.
description.italian: Uccidi qualcuno usando l'onda d'urto del lanciarazzi
description.spanish: Lanza a alguien al vacío con el lanzacohetes.
description.brazilian: Faça alguém cair e morrer usando o lançador de foguetes
description.russian: Заставьте кого-нибудь разбиться насмерть, упав от отдачи вашей ракетницы
description.polish: Wykorzystujac fale uderzeniowa RPG, spraw, by wrogi gracz zabil sie w wyniku upadku
description.turkish: Roket atarin geri teptirme etkisini kullan ve birinin düserek ölmesine yol aç

description.english: Kill 5 zombies by shooting them in the face with the pistol
description.german: Vernichte 5 Zombies, indem du ihnen mit der Pistole ins Gesicht schießt.
description.french: Tuez 5 zombies d'un tir à la tête avec le pistolet.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 zombie sparando loro in faccia con la pistola
description.spanish: Acaba con 5 zombis disparándoles a la cara con la pistola.
description.brazilian: Mate 5 zumbis atirando no rosto deles com a pistola
description.russian: Убейте 5 зомби, выстрелив им в лицо из пистолета
description.polish: Zabij 5 zombie, strzelajac im w twarz z pistoletu
description.turkish: Tabancayla suratlarindan vurarak 5 zombiyi öldür

description.english: Demolish 5 structures of 100 or more blocks using a grenade
description.german: Zerstöre mit einer Granate 5 Bauten aus 100 oder mehr Würfeln.
description.french: Démolissez 5 structures d'au moins 100 blocs à l'aide d'une grenade.
description.italian: Demolisci 5 strutture di almeno 100 blocchi usando una granata
description.spanish: Derriba 5 estructuras de al menos 100 bloques con una granada.
description.brazilian: Destrua 5 estruturas de 100 ou mais blocos usando uma granada
description.russian: Разрушьте 5 сооружений из 100 блоков или более с помощью гранаты
description.polish: Zburz 5 budowli majacych 100 lub wiecej bloków za pomoca granatu
description.turkish: Bir el bombasi kullanarak 100 veya daha fazla blokluk 5 yapiyi yik

description.english: Kill 10 enemies with the spade
description.german: Vernichte 10 Feinde mit dem Spaten.
description.french: Tuez 10 ennemis à l'aide de la pelle.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 nemici con la pala
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos con la pala.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 inimigos com a pá
description.russian: Убейте 10 врагов лопатой
description.polish: Zabij 10 wrogów za pomoca lopaty
description.turkish: Kürekle 10 düsmani öldür

description.english: 3 kills with sniper rifle without missing a shot
description.german: Führe 3 Kills mit dem Scharfschützengewehr aus, ohne einen Schuss zu verfehlen.
description.french: Tuez 3 ennemis à l'aide du fusil sniper sans rater un seul coup.
description.italian: 3 uccisioni con il fucile da cecchino senza mancare un colpo
description.spanish: Mata a 3 enemigos con el rifle de francotirador sin fallar ni un tiro.
description.russian: Убейте 3 врагов снайперской винтовкой, не промахнувшись ни разу
description.polish: 3 zabójstwa za pomoca karabinu snajperskiego bez zadnego chybionego strzalu
description.turkish: Keskin nisanci tüfegiyle hiç hedef kaçirmadan 3 düsmani öldür
description.brazilian: 3 mortes com o rifle de precisão sem errar um tiro

description.english: 25 headshots with the sniper rifle
description.german: Führe 25 Kopfschüsse mit dem Scharfschützengewehr aus.
description.french: Effectuez 25 tirs à la tête avec le fusil sniper.
description.italian: 25 colpi alla testa con il fucile da cecchino
description.spanish: Logra 25 tiros en la cabeza con el rifle de francotirador.
description.russian: 25 выстрелов в голову из снайперской винтовки
description.polish: 25 strzalów w glowe za pomoca karabinu snajperskiego
description.turkish: Keskin nisanci tüfegiyle 25 kez kafadan vur
description.brazilian: 25 tiros na cabeça com o rifle de precisão

description.english: Kill 5 players with landmines placed on the ground and re-buried
description.german: Vernichte 5 Spieler mit Landminen, die du platziert und vergraben hast.
description.french: Tuez 5 joueurs avec des mines antipersonnel placées au sol et enterrées.
description.italian: Uccidi 5 giocatori con mine terrestri posizionate a terra e ricoperte di terreno
description.spanish: Mata a 5 jugadores con minas terrestres enterradas en el suelo.
description.brazilian: Mate 5 jogadores com minas terrestres colocadas no chão e enterradas novamente
description.russian: Убейте 5 игроков, перезакопав 5 мин
description.polish: Zabij 5 graczy minami polozonymi na ziemi i na powrót zakopanymi
description.turkish: Yere koyulan ve yeniden gömülen mayinlarla 5 oyuncuyu öldür

description.english: Kill 10 enemies with the pickaxe
description.german: Vernichte 10 Feinde mit der Spitzhacke.
description.french: Tuez 10 ennemis à l'aide de la pioche.

description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos con el pico.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 inimigos com a picareta
description.russian: Убейте 10 врагов киркой
description.polish: Zabij 10 wrogów za pomoca kilofu
description.turkish: Kazmayla 10 düsmani öldür

description.english: Kill 20 enemies while using the jetpack
description.german: Vernichte 20 Feinde, während du den Raketenrucksack verwendest.
description.french: Tuez 20 ennemis tout en utilisant le jetpack.

description.brazilian: Mate 20 inimigos enquanto estiver usando a mochila-foguete

description.polish: Zabij 20 wrogów za pomoca plecaka odrzutowego
description.turkish: Uçus jetini kullanarak 20 düsmani öldür

description.english: Kill an enemy while he uses a jetpack
description.german: Vernichte einen Feind, während er einen Raketenrucksack verwendet.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi en train d'utiliser un jetpack.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico mentre usa un jetpack

description.russian: Убейте врага, использующего ракетный рюкзак
description.polish: Zabij wroga, gdy korzysta z plecaka odrzutowego
description.turkish: Uçus jeti kullanan bir düsmanini öldür

description.brazilian: 10 tiros na cabeça com a espingarda

description.english: Destroy 1000 blocks of enemy bases in demolition mode using the drill gun
description.german: Zerstöre mit der Bohrkanone im Zerstörungsmodus 1.000 Würfel an feindlichen Stützpunkten.

description.turkish: Sondaj topunu kullanarak yikim modunda düsman üslerinden 1.000 blok yok et

description.english: Kill 10 enemies by placing dynamite below them then blowing out the floor
description.german: Vernichte 10 Feinde, indem du unter ihnen Dynamit platzierst und dann den Boden in die Luft jagst.
description.french: Tuez 10 ennemis en plaçant sous eux de la dynamite puis en faisant exploser le sol.

description.turkish: Altlarina dinamit koyup zemini patlatarak 10 düsmanini öldür

description.brazilian: Dê 50 tiros na cabeça com o rifle de precisão

description.english: Kill ten players when your health is below 10% over multiple rounds
description.german: Tote 10 Spieler mit deiner Gesundheit unter 10% uber mehrere Runden
description.french: Tuez dix joueurs alors que votre sante est sous les 10 % durant plusieurs manches
description.italian: Uccidi 10 giocatori quando la tua salute e inferiore al 10% su piu turni
description.spanish: Elimina a 10 jugadores en varias rondas con tu salud por debajo del 10 %.
description.russian: В течение нескольких раундов убить десять игроков, имея уровень здоровья ниже 10%
description.polish: Zabij dziesieciu graczy, gdy przez kilka rund twoje zdrowie bedzie ponizej 10%
description.turkish: Birkaç turda, sağlığın %10'un altındayken on oyuncu öldür
description.brazilian: Mate 10 jogadores com vida abaixo de 10% em várias rodadas

description.english: As last man standing take out at least 5 zombies in one round
description.german: Tote mindestens 5 Zombies in einer Runde als letzter Uberlebender
description.french: Eliminez au moins 5 zombies en une manche en tant que dernier survivant
description.italian: Come ultimo uomo rimasto in piedi elimina almeno 5 zombie in un turno
description.spanish: Como ultimo superviviente, acaba con al menos 5 zombis en una ronda.
description.russian: Уничтожить не менее 5 зомби за раунд, будучи последним из выживших
description.polish: Bedac samotnie na placu boju, zabij przynajmniej 5 zombie w jednej rundzie
description.turkish: Son kalan kişi olarak, bir turda en az 5 zombi öldür
description.brazilian: Seja o último sobrevivente e elimine no mínimo 5 zumbis em uma rodada

description.english: As last man standing take out at least 10 zombies in one round
description.german: Tote mindestens 10 Zombies in einer Runde als letzter Uberlebender
description.french: Eliminez au moins 10 zombies en une manche en tant que dernier survivant
description.italian: Come ultimo uomo rimasto in piedi elimina almeno 10 zombie in un turno
description.spanish: Como ultimo superviviente, acaba con al menos 10 zombis en una ronda.
description.russian: Уничтожить не менее 10 зомби за раунд, будучи последним из выживших
description.polish: Bedac samotnie na placu boju, zabij przynajmniej 10 zombie w jednej rundzie
description.turkish: Son kalan kişi olarak, bir turda en az 10 zombi öldür
description.brazilian: Seja o último sobrevivente e elimine no mínimo 10 zumbis em uma rodada

description.english: Kill 5 players as a zombie in the water
description.german: Tote als Zombie im Wasser 5 Spieler
description.french: Tuez 5 joueurs dans l'eau en incarnant un zombie
description.italian: Uccidi 5 giocatori come zombie in acqua
description.spanish: Como zombi, elimina a 5 jugadores en el agua.
description.russian: Убить 5 игроков в воде, будучи зомби
description.polish: Zabij w wodzie 5 graczy jako zombie
description.turkish: Zombi olarak suda 5 oyuncu öldür
description.brazilian: Mate 5 jogadores como um zumbi na água

description.english: Destroy 666 blocks as a zombie
description.german: Zerstore als Zombie 666 Wurfel
description.french: Detruisez 666 blocs en incarnant un zombie
description.italian: Distruggi 666 blocchi come zombie
description.spanish: Como zombi, destruye 666 bloques.
description.russian: Уничтожить 666 блоков, будучи зомби
description.polish: Zniszcz 666 blokow jako zombie
description.turkish: Zombi olarak 666 blok yok et
description.brazilian: Destrua 666 blocos como um zumbi

description.english: Survive for 28 seconds as last man standing in one zombie round
description.german: Uberlebe als letzter Uberlebender 28 Sekunden in einer Zombierunde
description.french: Survivez pendant 28 secondes en tant que dernier survivant dans une manche zombie
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 28 secondi come ultimo uomo rimasto in piedi in un turno zombie
description.spanish: Como ultimo superviviente, sobrevive 28 segundos en una ronda de Zombi.
description.russian: Продержаться 28 секунд, будучи последним из выживших, в течение одного зомби-раунда
description.polish: Przezyj 28 sekund samotnie na placu boju podczas jednej rundy zombie
description.turkish: Bir zombi turunda son kalan kişi olarak 28 saniye boyunca hayatta kal
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 28 segundos como último sobrevivente em uma rodada de zumbi

description.english: Survive as last man for 10 minutes total over multiple zombie rounds
description.german: Uberlebe als letzter Uberlebender insgesamt 10 Minuten uber mehrere Zombierunden
description.french: Survivez pendant un total de 10 minutes en tant que dernier survivant dans plusieurs manches zombie
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 10 minuti totali come ultimo uomo in piedi in piu turni zombie
description.spanish: Como ultimo superviviente, sobrevive 10 minutos en total en varias rondas de Zombi.
description.russian: Продержаться в целом 10 минут, будучи последним из выживших, в разных зомби-раундах
description.polish: Przezyj 10 minut samotnie na placu boju podczas kilku rund zombie
description.turkish: Birkaç zombi turunda son kalan kişi olarak 10 dakika boyunca hayatta kal
description.brazilian: Sobreviva por pelo menos 10 minutos no total em várias rodadas de zumbi

description.english: Spend a total of an hour in the air
description.german: Verbringe eine Stunde in der Luft
description.french: Passez un total d'une heure dans les airs
description.italian: Trascorri 1 ora totale in aria
description.spanish: Pasa 1 hora en total por los aires.
description.russian: Провести в воздухе час в общем итоге
description.polish: Spedz w sumie godzine w powietrzu
description.turkish: Havada toplam bir saat harca
description.brazilian: Passe um total de 1 hora no ar

description.english: Kill 3 enemies in 20 seconds with the semi-auto sniper rifle
description.german: Tote 3 Gegner in 20 Sekunden mit dem halbautomatischen Scharfschutzengewehr
description.french: Tuez 3 ennemis en 20 secondes avec le fusil sniper semi-automatique
description.italian: Uccidi 3 nemici in 20 secondi con un fucile da cecchino semi-automatico
description.spanish: Elimina a 3 enemigos en 20 segundos con el rifle semiautomatico.
description.russian: Убить 3-х врагов из полуавтоматической снайперской винтовки за 20 секунд
description.polish: Zabij 3 wrogow w 20 sekund samopowtarzalnym karabinem snajperskim
description.turkish: Yarı otomatik nişancı tüfeği ile 20 saniyede 3 düşman öldür
description.brazilian: Mate 3 inimigos em 20 segundos com a semiautomática de precisão

description.english: 6 kills with sniper rifle without missing a shot
description.german: Tote 6 Gegner mit dem Scharfschutzengewehr ohne einen Schuss zu verfehlen
description.french: Tuez 6 ennemis avec le fusil sniper sans manquer un seul tir
description.italian: 6 uccisioni com fucile cecchino senza sbagliare un colpo
description.spanish: Elimina a 6 con el rifle de francotirador sin fallar un solo tiro.
description.russian: 6 поражений цели из снайперской винтовки подряд без промахов
description.polish: 6 zabojstw karabinem snajperskim bez chybienia
description.turkish: Nişancı tüfeği ile hiç ıskalamadan 4 kez öldür
description.brazilian: Faça 6 abates com o rifle de precisão sem perder nenhum tiro

description.english: Kill 5 players while carrying the intel in classic
description.german: Tote 5 Spieler wahrend du die Informationen tragst im klassischen Modus
description.french: Tuez 5 joueurs pendant que vous transportez les renseignements en mode classique
description.italian: Uccidi 5 giocatori trasportando la valigetta in mod. classica
description.spanish: Elimina a 5 jugadores mientras llevas la informacion clave en modo Clasico.
description.russian: Убить 5 игроков с разведчиком на руках в классическом режиме
description.polish: Zabij w trybie klasycznym 5 graczy niosacych dane
description.turkish: Klasikte istihbarat taşırken 5 oyuncu öldür
description.brazilian: Mate 5 jogadores enquanto transporta a inteligência no clássico
